rules.description: Fire safety inspection must be conducted within the last 12 months.
Structural audit must be conducted (every 3 years for buildings <15 yrs, annually for >15 yrs).
Reserve fund ratio (Total Funds / Required Reserve) must be >= 1.0.
Waste segregation (Wet/Dry) practices must be implemented.
Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) or system must be NMMC approved and operational.
